valid: For the period 00:00 (UTC) on Wed 3 Sep 2025 to 00:00 (UTC) on Thu 4 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Shannon 998 expected Forties 987 by 1800 Wednesday. Low Southeast Iceland 986 slow-moving and filling 989 by same time

Southerly backing southeasterly, 4 or 5, increasing 6 or 7, then becoming cyclonic later.

Moderate, becoming moderate or rough later.

Showers, rain later.

Good, occasionally poor.
